comments.body:
The current version is 5.5.33, but it looks like the download page still links to 5.5.32 (which has been removed, as it is no longer current).

As a work-round, try replacing 5.5.32 with 5.5.33 in the URL.

I updated the page with the correct version. Should be online in about an hour, as usual.

BTW, the US web server is down at the moment. The EU one works, http://tomcat.eu.apache.org/

description:
For Tomcat 5.5 only, when following a download link to a mirror, the system returns a 404. 

Downloading from the archive works, but the mirror links seem broken. 

Following the links has been tried from multiple networks. 

-Ted.
